being troubled on every side and being perplexed. But he says that they're not distressed and they're not in despair.
therefore seeing we have this ministry as we have received mercy. Notice those words, we faint not.
Though the outward man may perish, that the inward man is renewed day by day
for he hath made him to be sin for us. That's Jesus Christ, the sinless lamb of God, God in flesh, who knew no sin, that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
